/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a sense of being in the midst of the action. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the urban landscape below. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. Cars of different makes and models are scattered along the road, hinting at the city's active lifestyle. The street itself is lined with trees and lampposts, adding a touch of greenery to the urban setting. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and gives a sense of scale to the scene.
